name: Vinyl Destination
description:
Vinyl Destination, a game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 (theme: "Rewind").

As a novice DJ you start your adventure in the industry. The most important lesson awaits you. Can you make perfect scratches? Test your skills and reflexes in this difficult game that completely destroys the sense of space and its gameplay takes place on a spinning vinyl disc.

What is your highest score?

How to play?
You start with 8 lives (see: circles in the middle).
Dodge bullets.
Getting close to them will generate score and maintaining close distance will provide you with even more points!
Up/Down - movement
Z - rewind disc
C - change a song
Esc - go back to the menu


All assets used in the game were made by me, except songs which are from the public domain.
